entries.content: Objections are not rejections but information requests to determine if you should sell to them.
entries.notes: Speaker flips the script, making the prospect justify why they need the solution.

entries.content: Use questions to extract information, not to impress or give information.
Present alternatives (e.g., raising prices, firing underperformers) and have the prospect explain why those won't work—leading them to justify needing your solution.
I'm here to figure out if I should sell to you. You need to convince me.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
